attributes.action: Ensure that every restaurant/food service establishment provides an allergy menu
attributes.additional_details: Other serious allergies include: Milk, Eggs, Fish, Crustacean shellfish, Tree nuts, Peanuts, Wheat and Soybeans (source: http://www.fda.gov/Food/ResourcesForYou/Consumers/ucm079311.htm)
attributes.background: In many places to eat it's difficult to get allergy information. Allergies can be life threatening. For nut allergy sufferers (such as myself) and other sufferers there aren't many options. I'd like everywhere that serves food to have an allergy menu so that restaurants can be a safer place for all.

rejection.details: We're not sure what you mean by an "allergy menu". You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
